full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA YI DAM BSTAN BSRUNG MKHA' 'GRO SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR SPRUL PA'I CHOS RGYAL SKU LNGA GNYAN PO'I LHA TSOGS RNAMS MNYES PAR BYED PA'I TSOGS MCHOD YID BZHIN 'DOD 'JO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO MGON PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN, ,PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, ,MDZAD PA'I YI DAM SPYI'I TSOGS 'KHOR GYI, GZHUNG LA BRTEN NAS TSOGS 'KHOR BYA BA'I TSUL, ,TSOGS MCHOD YID BZHIN 'DOD 'JO ZHES PA 'DI, YID NI'I SLOB MA DGE SLONG CHOS MCHOG GYIS, RAB DKAR SEMS KYIS BSKUL BA NGOR BLANG NAS, BYA THAL PHUN TSOGS MING CAN GYIS SBYAR RO, ,'DI YI DGE BAS MKHA' KHYAB 'GRO BA KUN, ,BDE CHEN MCHOG GI DPAL LA RTAG ROL ZHING, ZHI KHRI RGYAL BA'I 'GOD PA YONGS RDZOGS PA'I, ,SKU GSUM ZHAL MED KHANG DU 'JUG PAR SHOG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,
